Name: CyberLink PowerDirector 21 Ultimate
About the game: PowerDirector 21 Ultimate Empower yourself with professional editing tools, features, and high-end performance capabilities to take complete control of the video production process and workflow, without the steep learning curve. New! AI Object Detection With Video Effects Automatically apply masks around people or objects to remove backgrounds, unwanted objects, or add effects. New! AI Motion Tracking Create text and VFX that smoothly follow the motion of objects or even the camera itself. New! GIF Maker Easily create and share viral animated GIFs. New! Video Intro Designer Discover and create attention-grabbing video intros alongside our community of creatives. New! NVIDIA Broadcast Support Experience state-of-the-art AI capabilities designed to enhance audio and video quality. New! In/Out Animations Bring dynamic energy to your footage with a vast collection of animations for PiP objects. Enhanced! AI Sky Replacement Enhance or totally replace the sky for perfect scenic shots. Select from a range of presets or import custom images. Enhanced! Mask & Blend Layer, shape, and blend like never before with enhanced keyframe controls. Enhanced! Cinematic Effects Enhance your shots with particles, transitions, and other visual effects.
